title: OPPO A31 (Lake Green, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adapter, USB Cable, SIM Card Pin, Protective Case (TPU), Quick Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Integrated Audio Decoding Chip, Dirac Sound Effect
product_specification.Other Display Features: Corning Gorilla Glass 3 Protection, 60 Hz Screen Refresh Rate, 10 Points Multi-touch Display, 120 Hz Touch Sampling Rate, 480 nit Maximum Screen Brightness, 70% Color Saturation, 1500:1 Color Contrast, 70% NTSC Color Gamut, 89% Screen Ratio, TÜV Rheinland Eye Comfort Certification, No Stroboscopic Eye Protection, Screen Proportion: 20:9
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 12 MP Main Camera, 2 MP Macro Lens, 2 MP Depth Camera, CMOS Sensor, Aperture: Main - f/1.8, Depth Camera - f/2.4, Macro Lens - f/2.4, Focal Length: Main - 4.05 mm, Depth Camera and Macro Lens - 1.77 mm, Wide Angle: Main - 75 Degrees, Depth Camera - 88.8 Degrees, Macro Lens - 88.8 Degrees, Lens Structure: Main - 5P, Depth Camera - 3P, Macro Lens - 3P, Focusing Method: Main - Contrast Focus + Phase Detection Auto Focus, Consecutive Shooting (20 Photos), Macro Lens: 4 cm Macro Camera, Photograph Mode: Photo, Video, Professional Mode, Panorama, Portrait, Time-lapse Photography, Characteristic Function for Photograph: Filters, AI Beautification, Bokeh, Video: Rear Camera - 1080P at 30 fps (Default), 720P at 30 fps, Sensor Sizes / Pixel Size (Main Camera): 1/2.86, 1.25 um
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 5P Lens Structure, f/2.0 Aperture, 79 Degree Wide Angle of Front Lens, 2.75 mm Focal Length, CMOS Sensor, Water-drop Camera Structure, 1/4 Sensor Size, 1.12um Pixel Size, Video: Front Camera - 1080P at 30 fps, 720P at 30 fps (Default)
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080P at 30 fps (Defualt), 720P at 30 fps, Front Camera: 1080P at 30 fps, 720P at 30 fps (Defualt)
product_specification.Sensors: Magnetic Induction Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, G-Sensor, Acceleration Sensor, Gyroscope, Pedometer
product_specification.Ringtones Format: MP3, AMR, APE, OGG, FLAC, WAV, MIDI, WMA
product_specification.Other Features: Number of RAM Channels: 2 Channels 16 Bytes, ROM Technology: HS400, HS200, OTG Storage Format: FAT12, FAT16, FAT32, NTFS, EXFAT, Split Screen, Picture in Picture, Data Backup, Face Unlock, Music Party, Apps Lock, File Encryption, Bluetooth Codec: SBC, APTX, APTX HD, LDAC, WLAN Display, MIC Noise Suppression, IPX4 Water Proof, HDMI Screening, Limit Number of Connction of Hotspot: 10 Hotspots, Battery Mode: BLP673, Heat Dissipation: Graphite Sheet
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, APE, FLAC, AMR, MID, MP3, OGG, WAV, WMA, MKA
product_specification.Video Formats: MP4, 3GP, ASF, AVI, FLV, M2TS, MKV, MPG, TS, WEBM, WMV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: Brand Warranty of 1 Year Available for Mobile Including Battery and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Large Storage Space: This mobile phone comes with a large RAM so that you can enjoy fast performance while gaming and using various apps. The large ROM allows you to download and save a large number of photos, vacation videos, and more. This mobile phone also supports additional storage so that you can save all your necessities.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery: Equipped with a 4230 mAh battery, this mobile phone ensures that you get to stream movies, groove to music, and more without running out of battery power in a short time.
product_description.Smooth Performance: Thanks to the 2.3 GHz Octa-core processor, this mobile phone ensures smooth gaming and video playback - without increasing power consumption. This way, you get to smoothly go about your tasks without exhausting the battery life.
product_description.Triple Rear Camera: This mobile phone comes with a 12 MP main camera that allows you to take clear and bright pictures. A macro lens enables you to capture the smallest details by objects that are as close as 4 cm to the lens. The depth camera allows you to take beautiful portraits of your loved ones.
product_description.Portrait Bokeh: The Portrait Bokeh effect helps you blur out the background of the photo so that the subject of the photo is in focus. It offers five new portrait styles so that you can take a range of beautiful shots.
product_description.Dazzle Colour Mode: With the pixel-mapping colour algorithm, the colours in the photos can stand out beautifully. The Dazzle Colour mode will ensure flowers and more look much more stunning by enhancing the colours.
product_description.8 MP Front AI Beautification Camera: This mobile phone comes with an 8 MP Front AI Beautification camera that can automatically identify gender and age so that the selfies come out more beautifully.
product_description.Immersive Viewing: This mobile phone comes with a smaller Nano-waterdrop Notch to give you an immersive gaming- and video-streaming experience. It also filters blue light so that you don’t experience eye fatigue and strain while using your phone.
product_description.Curved Body and Aesthetic Design: This mobile phone features an aesthetic design that includes a 3D ergonomic body to create a thin visual appearance. It facilitates one-hand holding, thanks to its display, size, aspect ratio, and thin and smooth one-body design.
product_description.Secure Fingerprint Unlock: You can unlock your phone in a jiffy with its rear fingerprint scanner.
product_description.ColorOS 6.1: This mobile phone features ColorOS 6.1 that facilitates smooth and intelligent navigation so that you can enjoy smooth usage, every time. The infinite design of Android 9.0 includes Smart Riding Mode7, Smart Assistance, Swipe-Up Gesture Navigation, and the OPPO Cloud Service7.

review:
This phone is worth the amount
Probably I'm giving this detailed review after a week of use.

This phone gives a really good battery backup if your a normal users like me , but first things first this is not a gaming phone , you can play pubg and you will find lags even if it's not in hd graphics.

The 12+2+2 mp cameras can capture a really good photos and it also has portrait mode , 6x zoom and macro lens which I find coordinates perfectly.

The selfie camera (8mp) also provides amazing selfies.

The security system in this phone is what I really liked so much

The fingerprint sensor is really fast just touch and your phone opens instantly.

The facial unlock is not as Fast as fingerprint , but you neednot press the power button to use facial unlock , just pickup the phone and it automatically turn on the screen.

The display is also pretty good with 720P resolution.

It has 3d anesthetic design.I bought mystery black variant .

Overall I give this product 4 stars totally .

Good and nice
It is gifted to my sister in law
She is so happy to see this phone 😍
Thank u filpcart
Nice pic and battery nice update nice camera picture oppo a31 rocket awesome
I am very happy to buy this phone . The product is great . Camera performance is nice .
Awesome thanks for the delivery too long. This Coran Time ur delivery support very peaceful feeling thank you so much flipkart nice products
Awesome phone with best emi and thr delevry boy is also great guy thnks flipkart nd thnks great offer and relations with us

It's was quite amazing.. main problem is with camera .. the quality of the camera is quite not ok .. Soo if you are a person looking for an Android latest version mobile with good battery backup and a nice beautiful display quality then this would suit you .. and for sure it's value for money
very nice phone i purchased this for my cousin brother and he liked it very much thanks flipkart for delivering the genuine product , this was my first phone order from flipkart .

If you are looking for a device with great battery and not for gaming then this device is good for you. Screen is 720p so its okay not the best i would say. volume is little low. In normal usage it won't disappoint you.
Camera 4/5
Display 3/5
Battery 5/5
Gaming 2/5
Conclusion: Good for someone who don't wanna play high end games like pubg, asphalt 8 and 9, and other games like this and wanna use this device for normal usage.

pros.4230 mAh Battery: Equipped with 4230 mAh battery, this mobile gives a long lasting backup. Awesome battery life.
pros.16.51 cm (6.5 inch) 1600 x 720 Pixels HD: With 720p resolution the display quality is amazing.

cons.Camera: The 12MP + 2MP + 2MP rear and 8MP front camera is not upto the mark, very poor in quality.

summary.verdict: The OPPO A31 is good buy when it comes to battery and amazing display.
summary.Additional Information: Supports 4g Volte, Contains Dual sim and memory card, Fingerprint unlock.
